Function.Name: ADDCALCULATEDMEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns a set generated by adding calculated members to a specified set.

Function.Name: AGGREGATE
Function.Description: Returns a calculated value using the appropriate aggregate function, based on the aggregation type of the member.

Function.Name: ALLMEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns a set containing all members of the level, including calculated members.

Function.Name: ALLMEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns a set containing all members of the hierarchy, including calculated members.

Function.Name: ANCESTOR
Function.Description: Returns the ancestor of a member at a specified level.

Function.Name: ANCESTOR
Function.Description: Returns the ancestor of a member at a specific distance away in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: ANCESTORS
Function.Description: Returns a set of all ancestors of a member at a specific distance above the member in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: ANCESTORS
Function.Description: Returns a set of all ancestors of a member at a specified level.

Function.Name: ASCENDANTS
Function.Description: Returns the set of the ascendants of the member.

Function.Name: AVG
Function.Description: Returns the average value of a numeric expression evaluated over a set.

Function.Name: AXIS
Function.Description: Returns a set defined in an axis.

Function.Name: BOTTOMNCOUNT
Function.Description: Returns a specified number of items from the bottom of a set, optionally sorting the set first.

Function.Name: BOTTOMPERCENT
Function.Description: Sorts a set and returns the specified number of bottommost elements whose cumulative total is at least a specified percentage.

Function.Name: BOTTOMSUM
Function.Description: Sorts a set and returns the specified number of bottommost elements whose cumulative total is at least a specified value.

Function.Name: CALCULATIONCURRENTPASS
Function.Description: Returns the current calculation pass of a cube for the specified query context.

Function.Name: CALCULATIONPASSVALUE
Function.Description: Returns the value of a numeric MDX expression evaluated over the specified calculation pass of a cube.

Function.Name: CHILDREN
Function.Description: Returns the children of a member.

Function.Name: CLOSINGPERIOD
Function.Description: Returns the last sibling among the descendants of a member at a specified level.

Function.Name: COALESCEEMPTY
Function.Description: Coalesces an empty cell value to a number.

Function.Name: CORRELATION
Function.Description: Returns the correlation of two series evaluated over a set.

Function.Name: DIMENSIONS.COUNT
Function.Description: Counts the number of hierarchies in the cube.

Function.Name: COUNT
Function.Description: Counts the number of members in the tuple.

Function.Name: COUNT
Function.Description: Counts the number of tuples in the set.

Function.Name: LEVELS.COUNT
Function.Description: Counts the number of levels in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: COUNT
Function.Description: Returns the number of tuples in a set, optionally including or excluding empty tuples.

Function.Name: COUSIN
Function.Description: Returns the child member with the same relative position under a parent member as the specified child member.

Function.Name: COVARIANCE
Function.Description: Returns the covariance of two series evaluated over a set, using the biased population formula.

Function.Name: COVARIANCEN
Function.Description: Returns the covariance of two series evaluated over a set, using the unbiased population formula.

Function.Name: CROSSJOIN
Function.Description: Returns the cross product of two sets.

Function.Name: CURRENT
Function.Description: Returns the current tuple from a set during an iteration.

Function.Name: CURRENTMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the current member along a hierarchy

Function.Name: CURRENTORDINAL
Function.Description: Returns the current ordinal during an iteration over a set

Function.Name: CUSTOMDATA
Function.Description: Returns the value of CustomData property

Function.Name: DATAMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the system-generated data member associated with a nonleaf member.

Function.Name: DEFAULTMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the default member of a hierarchy.

Function.Name: DESCENDANTS
Function.Description: Returns the set of descendants of a member at a specified level, optionally including or excluding descendants in other levels.

Function.Name: DESCENDANTS
Function.Description: Returns the set of descendants of a member at a specific distance away in the hierarchy, optionally including or excluding descendants in other levels.

Function.Name: DISTINCT
Function.Description: Returns a set, removing duplicate tuples from a specified set.

Function.Name: DISTINCTCOUNT
Function.Description: Returns the number of distinct tuples in a set.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNLEVEL
Function.Description: Drills down the members of a set one level below the lowest level represented in the set, or to one level below an optional level of a member represented in the set.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNLEVEL
Function.Description: Drills down the members of a set one level below the lowest level represented in the set, or to one level below a dimension optionally selected by its zero-based index of a member represented in the set.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNLEVELBOTTOM
Function.Description: Drills down the members of a specified count of bottom members of a set, at a specified level, to one level below.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNLEVELTOP
Function.Description: Drills down a specified count of top members of a set, at a specified level, to one level below.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNMEMBER
Function.Description: Drills down the members in a specified set that are present in a second specified set.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNMEMBERBOTTOM
Function.Description: Drills down the members in a specified set that are present in a second specified set, limiting the result set to a specified number of bottommost members.

Function.Name: DRILLDOWNMEMBERTOP
Function.Description: Drills down the members in a specified set that are present in a second specified set, limiting the result set to a specified number of topmost members.

Function.Name: DRILLUPLEVEL
Function.Description: Drills up the members of a set that are below a specified level.

Function.Name: DRILLUPMEMBER
Function.Description: Drills up the members in a specified set that are present in a second specified set.

Function.Name: EXCEPT
Function.Description: Finds the difference between two sets, optionally retaining duplicates.

Function.Name: EXTRACT
Function.Description: Returns a set of tuples from extracted dimension elements.

Function.Name: FILTER
Function.Description: Returns the set resulting from filtering a set based on a search condition.

Function.Name: FIRSTCHILD
Function.Description: Returns the first child of a specified member.

Function.Name: FIRSTSIBLING
Function.Description: Returns the first child of the parent of a specified member.

Function.Name: GENERATE
Function.Description: Applies a set to each member of another set and joins the resulting sets by union.

Function.Name: GENERATE
Function.Description: Returns a concatenated string created by evaluating a string expression over a set.

Function.Name: HEAD
Function.Description: Returns the first specified number of elements in a set.

Function.Name: HIERARCHIZE
Function.Description: Orders the members of a specified set in a hierarchy in natural or, optionally, post-natural order.

Function.Name: HIERARCHY
Function.Description: Returns the hierarchy of a specified level.

Function.Name: HIERARCHY
Function.Description: Returns the hierarchy of a specified dimension.

Function.Name: IIF
Function.Description: Returns one of values determined by a logical test.

Function.Name: INTERSECT
Function.Description: Returns the intersection of two sets, optionally retaining duplicates.

Function.Name: IS
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if two compared objects are equivalent, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ISANCESTOR
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if a specified member is an ancestor of another specified member, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ISEMPTY
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if the evaluated expression is the empty cell value, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ISGENERATION
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if a specified member is in a specified generation, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ISLEAF
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if a specified member is a leaf member, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ISSIBLING
Function.Description: Returns TRUE if a specified member is a sibling of another specified member, FALSE otherwise.

Function.Name: ITEM
Function.Description: Returns a member from a specified tuple.

Function.Name: ITEM
Function.Description: Returns a tuple from a specified set.

Function.Name: KPICURRENTTIMEMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the current time member of the KPI

Function.Name: KPIGOAL
Function.Description: Returns the goal of the KPI.

Function.Name: KPISTATUS
Function.Description: Returns the measure with normalized status between -1 and 1 of the KPI.

Function.Name: KPITREND
Function.Description: Returns the measure with normalized trend between -1 and 1 of the KPI

Function.Name: KPIVALUE
Function.Description: Returns the measure with normalized value between -1 and 1 of the KPI

Function.Name: KPIWEIGHT
Function.Description: Returns the measure with weight of the KPI

Function.Name: LAG
Function.Description: Returns the member that is a specified number of positions prior to a specified member along the dimension of the member.

Function.Name: LASTCHILD
Function.Description: Returns the last child of a specified member.

Function.Name: LASTPERIODS
Function.Description: Returns a set of members prior to and including a specified member.

Function.Name: LASTSIBLING
Function.Description: Returns the last child of the parent of a specified member.

Function.Name: LEAD
Function.Description: Returns the member that is a specified number of positions following a specified member along the dimension of the member.

Function.Name: LEVEL
Function.Description: Returns the level of a member.

Function.Name: LEVELS
Function.Description: Returns the level whose zero-based position in a dimension is specified by a numeric expression.

Function.Name: LINKMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the member equivalent to a specified member in a specified hierarchy.

Function.Name: LINREGINTERCEPT
Function.Description: Calculates the linear regression of a set and returns the value of b in the regression line y = ax + b.

Function.Name: LINREGPOINT
Function.Description: Calculates the linear regression of a set and returns the value of y in the regression line y = ax + b.

Function.Name: LINREGR2
Function.Description: Calculates the linear regression of a set and returns R² (the coefficient of determination).

Function.Name: LINREGSLOPE
Function.Description: Calculates the linear regression of a set and returns the value of a in the regression line y = ax + b.

Function.Name: LINREGVARIANCE
Function.Description: Calculates the linear regression of a set and returns the variance associated with the regression line y = ax + b.

Function.Name: LOOKUPCUBE
Function.Description: Returns the value of an MDX expression evaluated over another specified cube in the same database.

Function.Name: MAX
Function.Description: Returns the maximum value of a numeric expression evaluated over a set.

Function.Name: MEASUREGROUPMEASURES
Function.Description: Returns the set of measures in the measure group.

Function.Name: MEDIAN
Function.Description: Returns the median value of a numeric expression evaluated over a set.

Function.Name: MEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns the set of all members in a specified hierarchy.

Function.Name: MEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns the set of all members at a specified level in a dimension.

Function.Name: MEMBERTOSTR
Function.Description: Returns a string in Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) format from a member.

Function.Name: MEMBERVALUE
Function.Description: Returns the value of a member with its original data type.

Function.Name: MIN
Function.Description: Returns the minimum value of a numeric expression evaluated over a set.

Function.Name: MTD
Function.Description: Returns a set of members from the Month level in a Time dimension starting with the first period and ending with a specified member.

Function.Name: NAME
Function.Description: Returns the name of a specified member.

Function.Name: NAME
Function.Description: Returns the name of a specified hierarchy.

Function.Name: NAME
Function.Description: Returns the name of a specified level.

Function.Name: NAMETOSET
Function.Description: Returns a set containing a single member based on a string expression containing a member name.

Function.Name: NEXTMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the next member in the level that contains a specified member.

Function.Name: NONEMPTY
Function.Description: Returns subset of first set with removed empty tuples based on the cross product with a second set.

Function.Name: NONEMPTYCROSSJOIN
Function.Description: Returns the cross product of two or more sets as a set, excluding empty members.

Function.Name: OPENINGPERIOD
Function.Description: Returns the first sibling among the descendants of a specified level, optionally at a specified member.

Function.Name: ORDER
Function.Description: Arranges the members of a specified set, optionally preserving or breaking the hierarchy.
Function.Template: ORDER( «Set», {«String Expression» | «Numeric Expression»}[, ASC | DESC | BASC | BDESC] )

Function.Name: ORDINAL
Function.Description: Returns the zero-based ordinal value associated with a specified level.

Function.Name: PARALLELPERIOD
Function.Description: Returns a member from a prior period in the same relative position as a specified member.

Function.Name: PARENT
Function.Description: Returns the parent of a specified member.

Function.Name: PERIODSTODATE
Function.Description: Returns a set of members (periods) from a specified level starting with the first member and ending with a specified member.

Function.Name: PREDICT
Function.Description: Returns a value of a numeric expression evaluated over a data mining model.

Function.Name: PREVMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the previous member in the level that contains a specified member.

Function.Name: PROPERTIES
Function.Description: Returns a string containing the value of the specified member property.

Function.Name: QTD
Function.Description: Returns a set of members from the Quarter level in a Time dimension starting with the first period and ending with a specified member.

Function.Name: RANK
Function.Description: Returns the one-based rank of a specified tuple in a specified set.

Function.Name: ROLLUPCHILDREN
Function.Description: Returns a value generated by rolling up the values of the children of a specified member using the specified unary operator.

Function.Name: SETTOARRAY
Function.Description: Converts one or more sets to an array for use in a user-defined function.

Function.Name: SETTOSTR
Function.Description: Constructs a string in MDX format from a set.

Function.Name: SIBLINGS
Function.Description: Returns the set of siblings of a specified member, including the member itself.

Function.Name: STDDEV
Function.Description: Returns the standard deviation of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using an unbiased population. (Alias for Stdev.)

Function.Name: STDDEVP
Function.Description: Returns the standard deviation of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using a biased population. (Alias for StdevP.)

Function.Name: STDEVP
Function.Description: Returns the standard deviation of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using an unbiased population.

Function.Name: STDEVP
Function.Description: Returns the standard deviation of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using a biased population.

Function.Name: STRIPCALCULATEDMEMBERS
Function.Description: Returns a set generated by removing calculated members from a specified set.

Function.Name: STRTOMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns a member from a string expression in MDX format.

Function.Name: STRTOSET
Function.Description: Constructs a set from a specified string expression in MDX format.

Function.Name: STRTOTUPLE
Function.Description: Constructs a tuple from a specified string expression in MDX format.

Function.Name: STRTOVALUE
Function.Description: Returns a value from a string expression.

Function.Name: SUBSET
Function.Description: Returns a subset of members from a specified set.

Function.Name: SUM
Function.Description: Returns the sum of a numeric expression evaluated over a specified set.

Function.Name: TAIL
Function.Description: Returns a subset of members from the end of a specified set.

Function.Name: TOGGLEDRILLSTATE
Function.Description: Toggles the drill state of members.

Function.Name: TOPCOUNT
Function.Description: Returns a specified number of items from the topmost members of a specified set, optionally ordering the set first.

Function.Name: TOPPERCENT
Function.Description: Sorts a set and returns the topmost elements whose cumulative total is at least a specified percentage.

Function.Name: TOPSUM
Function.Description: Sorts a set and returns the topmost elements whose cumulative total is at least a specified value.

Function.Name: TUPLETOSTR
Function.Description: Returns a string in MDX format from a specified tuple.

Function.Name: UNION
Function.Description: Returns a set generated by the union of two sets, optionally retaining duplicate members.

Function.Name: UNIQUENAME
Function.Description: Returns the unique name of a specified hierarchy.

Function.Name: UNIQUENAME
Function.Description: Returns the unique name of a specified member.

Function.Name: UNIQUENAME
Function.Description: Returns the unique name of a specified level.

Function.Name: UNKNOWNMEMBER
Function.Description: Returns the domain name and user name of the current connection.

Function.Name: UNORDER
Function.Description: Returns a set without ordering.

Function.Name: VALIDMEASURE
Function.Description: Returns a value computed at the granularity of the measure group without unrelated dimensions and/or attributes.

Function.Name: VALUE
Function.Description: Returns the value of a specified member.

Function.Name: VAR
Function.Description: Returns the variance of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using an unbiased population.

Function.Name: VARIANCE
Function.Description: Returns the variance of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using an unbiased population. (Alias for Var function.)

Function.Name: VARIANCEP
Function.Description: Returns the variance of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using a biased population. (Alias for VarP function.)

Function.Name: VARP
Function.Description: Returns the variance of a numeric expression evaluated over a set, using a biased population.

Function.Name: VISUALTOTALS
Function.Description: Returns a set generated by dynamically totaling child members in a specified set, optionally using a pattern for the name of the parent member in the result set.

Function.Name: WTD
Function.Description: Returns a set of members from the Week level in a Time dimension starting with the first period and ending with a specified member.

Function.Name: YTD
Function.Description: Returns a set of members from the Year level in a Time dimension starting with the first period and ending with a specified member.
